name: Coordinate Epic Implementation
title: Coordinate Epic Implementation
task: Outline the steps to coordinate implementation across multiple teams.
goal: Ensure successful and synchronized delivery of epics.
details: Include coordination mechanisms and communication plans.

name: Define Epic Success Criteria
title: Define Epic Success Criteria
task: List success criteria for a new epic and how to measure them.
goal: Ensure clarity and alignment on epic objectives and outcomes.
context: At the start of epic planning.
details: Include success metrics and evaluation methods.

name: Manage Epic Backlog
title: Manage Epic Backlog
task: Describe your process for managing and prioritizing the epic backlog.
goal: Maintain a well-defined and prioritized backlog for the epic.
context: Ongoing, as part of epic management.
details: Include backlog refinement and prioritization techniques.

name: Stakeholder Communication
title: Stakeholder Communication
task: Explain how you communicate epic progress to stakeholders.
goal: Keep stakeholders informed and engaged throughout the epic lifecycle.
details: Include communication channels and reporting formats.

name: Risk Assessment for Epics
title: Risk Assessment for Epics
task: Identify and assess risks associated with epic delivery.
goal: Proactively manage risks to ensure successful epic delivery.
details: Include risk identification, analysis, and mitigation planning.

name: Epic Roadmap Planning
title: Epic Roadmap Planning
task: Outline a roadmap for epic delivery and key milestones.
goal: Provide a clear and actionable plan for epic implementation.
context: At the start of epic planning and during PI planning.
details: Include roadmap components and milestone tracking.

name: Cross-Team Collaboration
title: Cross-Team Collaboration
task: List best practices for collaborating across teams on epic work.
goal: Enhance teamwork and communication across functional boundaries.

name: Epic Retrospective
title: Epic Retrospective
task: Describe how you conduct a retrospective for completed epics.
goal: Learn from past epics to improve future delivery.
context: At the end of each epic.
details: Include retrospective formats and follow-up actions.

name: Epic Value Proposition
title: Epic Value Proposition
task: Articulate the value proposition of a new epic.
goal: Clearly define and communicate the epic's unique value.
context: During epic initiation and stakeholder presentations.
details: Include competitive advantages and key benefits.

name: Epic Metrics Tracking
title: Epic Metrics Tracking
task: Identify key metrics to track for epic progress and success.
goal: Utilize metrics for data-driven decision-making and process enhancement.
context: Ongoing, during and after each epic.
details: Include metrics like epic velocity, predictability, and quality.

name: Epic Change Management
title: Epic Change Management
task: Explain your approach to managing changes within an epic.
goal: Effectively handle changes to epic scope, schedule, and resources.
context: As changes are proposed and approved.
details: Include change control processes and communication plans.

name: Epic Documentation
title: Epic Documentation
task: List documentation required for epic implementation and handoff.
goal: Ensure comprehensive and accessible documentation for all aspects of the epic.
context: During epic planning, execution, and closure.
details: Include documentation standards and storage locations.
